patches.content:
TEMPLATE = app
TARGET = tests
CONFIG += console testcase
QT += testlib svg

# 假设项目根目录为 Diagramscene_ultima-syz
# 包含被测源文件和头文件
include(../../diagramscene_ultima-syz.pri)

# 如果不存在 .pri 文件，则直接添加文件
# 注意：这里需要根据实际项目结构调整路径
SOURCES += \
    test_arrow.cpp \
    ../../arrow.cpp

HEADERS += \
    ../../arrow.h \
    ../../diagramitem.h

# 测试输出目录
DESTDIR = $$OUT_PWD/bin
OBJECTS_DIR = $$OUT_PWD/obj
MOC_DIR = $$OUT_PWD/moc
RCC_DIR = $$OUT_PWD/rcc
UI_DIR = $$OUT_PWD/ui
QMAKE_CXXFLAGS += --coverage
QMAKE_LFLAGS += --coverage
